device.getMonitor: select * from device_infos join device_rows on device_infos.deviceId=device_rows.deviceId where device_infos.deviceId='%s'

create.users: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS users ( email text, password text, user_id text, register_dt timestamp, login_dt timestamp, PRIMARY KEY (email))

map.getTagPosition: select * from map_tag_position_last where tag_id='%s' limit 1 ALLOW FILTERING
